I am  worried that he is going to push Frank to far and Frank will not be h=
ere anymore
THAT IS WHAT I AM AFRAID OF... And he is the most important per=
son here.
It's his group....and if he gets mad enough he will end it, and t=
hen what ?

________________________________
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com =
[mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Salvi
Sent: Monday, August 23=
, 2010 7:44 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: AW: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,


=

i hope that RJ stay for a long time here because i like its methods and hi=
s ideas.
if you dont like read his mails, then lets swing the delete key on=
 your keyboard.
leave him write his ideas, because others (like me) want to=
 continue to read.

________________________________
Von: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] Im Auftrag von Fransen, Debbie
Gese=
ndet: Montag, 23. August 2010 13:25
An: 'EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com'
Betreff: =
RE: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



RJ, it is very obvious that you are not here for th=
e same reasons we are. We are trying to prove something we know, and
you ar=
e trying to disprove it .
Why don't we all just ignore him from now on and =
not reply to anything he says and maybe he will go away.....
Bye RJ. You ar=
e just not in the group that you need to be in....


______________________=
__________
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] O=
n Behalf Of Rj
Sent: Sunday, August 22, 2010 6:17 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



I realize you have plenty of subject=
ive anecdotal evidence.I don't consider that 'hard evidence' however.  I am=
 looking for something a little more objective and less subject to influenc=
e and interpretations.

And stop putting words in my mouth. A person can mi=
sinterpret something, mistake something, or confuse something, without lyin=
g about something.  And before you jump down my throat claiming I am saying=
 all results are mistakes, I am not.  I am performing experiments, keeping =
an open mind, and considering all evidence I find.

The way you have been a=
ttacking me by calling me names at every turn, just because I try new thing=
s and don't always agree with your world view, is eerily reminiscent of the=
 way the church of old tried to suppress new thought and discoveries, excep=
t you're just substituting the word 'heretic' with 'science'. and 'blasphem=
y' with anything that disagrees with you.

There's an old saying:  "We beco=
me that which we hate".  So far, all you've done is denounce people's effor=
ts to try new methods and see what works.  You accept nothing anyone else p=
roposes if it does not agree with you.  That is the realm of the extreme sk=
eptic: the same skeptic you ridicule.

You certainly don't have to agree wi=
th my comments.  And I don't have to agree with yours.  But no one needs al=
l the name calling Frank.   It really adds nothing to support your theories=
.



--- On Sun, 8/22/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:=


From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] S=
camp,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, August 22, 2010, 2:15 PM


=

 Yeah I know, science no accept anecdotes. There is plenty of hard evidenc=
e, trouble, science don't accept that either cuz they are taught, no spirit=
s, so there are no sprit voices, fact is fact is facts. Well that's about a=
ll there is in this field. Perhaps you should take bird watching or somethi=
ng concrete. To not accept what others say is the same as calling us all li=
ars, and I find very insulting.

 How irrational is it to ignore all eviden=
ce and continuously try to fit the phenomon into a diffintion where it will=
 not fit and does not belong, and then claim you're looking for a more rati=
onal explantation, it just does not make sense. I say forget the BS "scienc=
e" whatever that is, puts out and try thinking on your own.  Mr Spock was a=
 fictional charactor!

 F-S

a in controlled conditions, and personal anecdotes, are not the same thing,=

ogroups.com>

 If you completely=
 ignore what everyone else in the whole wide freaking world gets via EVP, v=
arious photography and ITC methods, and just chance encounters, then yeah, =
you probably don't have any data, and won't have any data no matter what.

=
F-S

ttp://mc/compose?to=3Drickwegrzyn@...>> wrote:

ed to go to the cemetary and see what you get there....

From: Rj <rasterer@...<http://mc/compose?to=3Drasterer=
@...>>

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<http://mc/compose?to=3DEVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com>
Sent: Sat, August 21, 2010 2:29:36 PM

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC=
] Scamp,



I don't think I have enough data yet to make any conclusions, s=
o I plan more experiments.  Since there are different distinct claims about=
 what the box or the recorders can do, I try to make different distinct exp=
eriments for each.

Some people claim they can get the box to tell them thi=
ngs that the operator couldn't know, so my "whats the object" experiment is=
 one way to examine that.  Some people claim the boxes can make predictions=
, so cataloging predictions and examining the results can help examine that=
.  If there are other claims, I will try to figure experiments based on tho=
se.

--- On Sat, 8/21/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...<http://=
mc/compose?to=3Dpurplealiengirl@...>> wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <p=
urplealiengirl@...<http://mc/compose?to=3Dpurplealiengirl@...>>=

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<http://mc/compos=
e?to=3DEVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Saturday, August 21, 2010, 12:48 PM

=


 I get our last dogs from time to time, and used to get them via white no=
ise when I first started this. Last summer some kids came down into the bas=
ement wiht the younger grandson, and the little yorkie barked, but "get out=
ta here" came out, some how.

 Yeah, I think I was too hard on RJ. I don't =
know why, but testing doens't seem to work, but we get enough to prove this=
 to ourselves. It's probably a faith thing, although I'm not religious, eve=
n anti-religion.

 F-S




On Fri, Aug 20, 2010 at 6:27 PM, <SnowfireL@aol.=
com> wrote:

[Attachment(s)<https://mail.google.com/mail/?ui=3D2&view=3Djs&=
name=3Dmain,tlist&ver=3D9oD1J7yvz5o.en.&am=3D%21xONyw1plirqxhZ4a1PIWg1xlTve=
uJ8oWIzqJ6mz0Dt83ht4Zrp4&fri#12a920b21a6295da_TopText> from SnowfireL@aol.c=
om included below]

Here is a short file, where someone says, "Scamp, Scamp=
," then Scamp barks. "yap."  This little dog belonged to my grandma, when I=
 was about 9 or 10 years old, he was a Manchester Terrier, and lived with u=
s for many years, and this is his bark for sure.  I'd know that bark anywhe=
re.  Sorry, that I can't make it any clearer, I need to get one of those be=
tter ghost boxes I guess.  RJ, spirits are just like us, they are not omnip=
resent like God,  probably why David doesn't want to play the guessing game=
, he has better things to do over there, and has said, they have thousands =
of people standing in this long line waiting to get into the Heavens, and H=
e can't just drop His job and go to your house to see what you have over th=
ere, He did tell me that first time what it was, and i sent it to you, but =
it was too late.  It's hard for me to understand them sometimes, He was als=
o right about that little boy, Syler being killed, and where his body would=
 be found, I don't know what they did about it though. sf
